Name: Paper Ship Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
This paper boat enables you to Double Jump and travel at a noticeably fast speed.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
This paper boat enables you to Double Jump and travel at a noticeably fast speed. Double-click a location on the World Map, and you will automatically fly to the destination following the navigation line. (Autopilot is available only on Victoria Island and some other continents. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
This paper boat enables you to Double Jump and travel at a noticeably fast speed.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
